PLAY.TITLE: Twelfth Night, or What You Will

PERSONAE.TITLE: Dramatis Personae
PERSONAE.PERSONA: ANTONIO, a sea captain, friend to Sebastian.
A Sea Captain, friend to Viola.
SIR TOBY BELCH, uncle to Olivia.
Lords, Priests, Sailors, Officers, Musicians, and other Attendants.

PLAY.SCNDESCR: SCENE A city in Illyria, and the sea-coast near it.

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. DUKE ORSINO's palace.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter DUKE ORSINO, CURIO, and other Lords;
Musicians attending

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE II. The sea-coast.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter VIOLA, a Captain, and Sailors

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE III. OLIVIA'S house.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter SIR TOBY BELCH and MARIA

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE IV. DUKE ORSINO's palace.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter VALENTINE and VIOLA in man's attire
Enter DUKE ORSINO, CURIO, and Attendants

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE III. OLIVIA's house.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter SIR TOBY BELCH and SIR ANDREW

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE IV. DUKE ORSINO's palace.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter DUKE ORSINO, VIOLA, CURIO, and others

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE V. OLIVIA's garden.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter SIR TOBY BELCH, SIR ANDREW, and FABIAN

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. OLIVIA's garden.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter VIOLA, and Clown with a tabour
Enter SIR TOBY BELCH, and SIR ANDREW

SPEECH.SPEAKER: OLIVIA
SPEECH.STAGEDIR: Exeunt SIR TOBY BELCH, SIR ANDREW, and MARIA

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE II. OLIVIA's house.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter SIR TOBY BELCH, SIR ANDREW, and FABIAN

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE IV. OLIVIA's garden.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Re-enter MARIA, with SIR TOBY BELCH and FABIAN
Exeunt SIR TOBY BELCH, FABIAN, and MARIA
Re-enter SIR TOBY BELCH and FABIAN
Re-enter SIR TOBY BELCH, with SIR ANDREW

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. Before OLIVIA's house.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter SIR ANDREW, SIR TOBY BELCH, and FABIAN

SPEECH.SPEAKER: OLIVIA
SPEECH.STAGEDIR: Exeunt SIR TOBY BELCH, SIR ANDREW, and FABIAN

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE II. OLIVIA's house.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter SIR TOBY BELCH and MARIA
Exeunt SIR TOBY BELCH and MARIA

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. Before OLIVIA's house.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter DUKE ORSINO, VIOLA, CURIO, and Lords

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SIR ANDREW
SPEECH.STAGEDIR: Enter SIR TOBY BELCH and Clown

SCENE.STAGEDIR: Exeunt Clown, FABIAN, SIR TOBY BELCH, and SIR ANDREW

SPEECH.SPEAKER: OLIVIA
SPEECH.STAGEDIR: Re-enter Clown with a letter, and FABIAN
